item.description: A brief summary of my GSoC 2023 work

item.title: Why do I have a blog
item.description: Why? Get hired I use this blog as a clever tactic to attract awesome recruiters and companies who might want to hire me. It’s like my own personal job-hunting billboard. Improve my writing/language skills I’m not the a good writer (yet), but I’m constantly working on it! Every time someone visits my blog, I learn a new word to add to my growing vocabulary. If you see me in person, feel free to quiz me on the meaning of the word arabesque .
